article.title: Status and history for cjk
article.para: No known problems at this time.

history.history-entry: The OHCHR document seems to be corrupted. Article 10 should not be a list. There are two headers “LIJI LYA MUCIKUMI NYI AALI”, and they start with the same sentence as the previous article. Our version attempts to repair those defects.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
